name: Frost Kissed
description:
No visuals and no leads. 

You only have sounds to lead your way through the frost kissed wasteland.

You start the game alone, almost frozen to death until two survivors find you in a shelter. And so begins your journey to the only safe place known: the power plant. 

However, to reach there, you will have to listen to the sounds and choose wisely. 

Your choices will have consequences.
